amendment.description: Amendment allows funds to be used for installation and upgrading of recreational structures and physical education facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 111-106 to allow funds to be used to install and upgrade recreational structures and physical education facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Heinrich.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Heinrich amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
